short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds the game by name and shows the price of the game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watching Youtube games and want to buy games cheaper?
This add-on will help you to find games from Youtube and buy them cheaper!

When you watch videos you'll get a window offering you the best price.
Watch and play games right now!
